template&lt;
    class CharT,
    class Traits = std::char_traits&lt;CharT&gt;
&gt; class basic_spanstream
    : public basic_iostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;
}}

The class template {{tt|std::basic_spanstream}} implements input and output operations on streams based on fixed buffers.

At the low level, the class essentially wraps a raw device implementation of {{lc|std::basic_spanbuf}} into a higher-level interface of {{lc|std::basic_iostream}}. The complete interface to unique {{lc|std::basic_spanbuf}} members is provided.
